languages.text: "Лучше. Иногда мне кажется, что я вот-вот сорвусь, но вспоминаю ваши слова, и голова проясняется".
"Better. Sometimes, it feels like I'm slipping, but then I remember what you said, and my head clears."
languages.original_text: "Лучше. Иногда мне кажется, что я вот-вот сорвусь, но вспоминаю ваши слова, и голова проясняется".

traits.locale_text: "Better. Sometimes it feels like I'm slipping, but then I remember what you said, and my head clears."
"Better. Sometimes it feels like I'm slipping, but then I remember what you said, and my head clears."
"Better. Sometimes, it feels like I'm slipping, but then I remember what you said, and my head clears."
"Better. Sometimes, it feels like I'm slipping, but then I remember what you said, and my head clears."
"Better. Sometimes, it feels like I'm slipping, but then I remember what you said, and my head clears."
"Better. Sometimes, it feels like I'm slipping, but then I remember what you said, and my head clears."

languages.text: 「少し落ち着きました。時々、自分が崩れていくような気がすることもあります。ですが、あなたの言葉を思い出すと、頭の中がすっと晴れるんです」
languages.original_text: "Better. Sometimes, it feels like I'm slipping, but then I remember what you said, and my head clears."

traits.locale_text: 「少し落ち着きました。時々、自分が崩れていくような気がすることもあります。ですが、あなたの言葉を思い出すと、頭の中がすっと晴れるんです」

languages.text: "Besser. Manchmal scheint mir alles zu entgleiten, aber dann denke ich an Eure Worte, und mein Kopf wird frei."
languages.original_text: "Better. Sometimes, it feels like I'm slipping, but then I remember what you said, and my head clears."

traits.locale_text: "Besser. Manchmal scheint mir alles zu entgleiten, aber dann denke ich an Eure Worte, und mein Kopf wird frei."

languages.text: « Je me sens mieux. Parfois, j'ai l'impression de perdre pied, puis je repense à tout ce que vous m'avez dit et mon esprit s'apaise. »
languages.original_text: "Better. Sometimes, it feels like I'm slipping, but then I remember what you said, and my head clears."

traits.locale_text: « Je me sens mieux. Parfois, j'ai l'impression de perdre pied, puis je repense à tout ce que vous m'avez dit et mon esprit s'apaise. »

languages.text: «Mejor. A veces siento que pierdo el control, pero entonces recuerdo lo que me dijo y se me despeja la cabeza».
languages.original_text: "Better. Sometimes, it feels like I'm slipping, but then I remember what you said, and my head clears."

traits.locale_text: «Mejor. A veces siento que pierdo el control, pero entonces recuerdo lo que me dijo y se me despeja la cabeza».

languages.text: “我好些了。有时候，我感觉自己像是一直在走神一样，但每当想起你说的话，我的头脑就会清晰起来。”
languages.original_text: "Better. Sometimes, it feels like I'm slipping, but then I remember what you said, and my head clears."

traits.locale_text: “我好些了。有时候，我感觉自己像是一直在走神一样，但每当想起你说的话，我的头脑就会清晰起来。”

languages.text: "Daha iyiyim. Bazen kontrolü yitiriyormuş gibi hissediyorum ama sizin söyledikleriniz aklıma gelince zihnim berraklaşıyor."
languages.original_text: "Better. Sometimes, it feels like I'm slipping, but then I remember what you said, and my head clears."

traits.locale_text: "Daha iyiyim. Bazen kontrolümü yitiriyormuşum gibi hissediyorum ama sizin söyledikleriniz aklıma gelince zihnim berraklaşıyor."

languages.original_text: "Better. Sometimes, it feels like I'm slipping, but then I remember what you said, and my head clears."
